projects.title: DevMeet - Student Networking Platform
projects.description: DevMeet is a comprehensive MERN-based student networking platform designed to connect students, facilitate collaboration, and provide AI-powered study assistance. Features include real-time chat functionality, JWT-based secure authentication, optimized MongoDB aggregation pipelines, and seamless user interactions for academic networking.

projects.title: MotluPets - E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: MotluPets is a fully functional e-commerce platform for pet supplies deployed on AWS EC2 with Dockerized microservices architecture. Integrated secure payment processing, optimized REST APIs, Jenkins CI/CD pipelines for automated deployments, and comprehensive product management system.

projects.title: HelpMate - On-Demand Home Service Platform
projects.description: HelpMate is a modern on-demand home service platform that connects users with professional service providers for various household needs. Built with a responsive UI using React and Tailwind CSS, featuring state management with Redux, smooth routing with React Router, and an intuitive user experience for booking home services like cleaning, repairs, and maintenance.

about.main: I'm Balram Prajapati, a final-year B.Tech Information Technology student at Oriental Institute of Science and Technology, Bhopal, with a CGPA of 7.51. I'm a passionate full-stack developer and backend engineer with hands-on experience building scalable applications and cloud-based solutions.
about.journey: With strong academic credentials (95.8% in 12th, 95.4% in 10th), I've worked as a Software Development Intern at AceMagick, building 15+ production-grade APIs and deploying services on AWS Lambda. I've led cross-functional teams and implemented enterprise-level solutions.
about.passion: I'm passionate about building robust, scalable backend systems and optimizing cloud infrastructure. I excel at solving complex architectural challenges, implementing CI/CD pipelines, and mentoring junior developers. My goal is to become a proficient backend/full-stack engineer driving technological innovation.
about.connect: Let's collaborate on innovative projects! Whether it's backend optimization, cloud architecture, or full-stack development, I'm ready to contribute my expertise.
